english.segment7: Another way fought and anger fed again. Another day lost, we've found more hate to send. Some other past time we found some way. To see thee others flaws as small. and still forgive other's mistakes. We had no time to let unity ever binding lose control. Or let some standard conditioning our likeness take it's toll. When the differences settle. and when the spite comes to an end. We'll be reminded of a time when me. and you used to be friends. (Always change in me)
